Your 24×7 Wellness Partner

Discover gentle pathways to emotional balance and lasting mental wellness through compassionate, personalized support.

Our Story Begins With Listening

Empowering Individuals with mental health focus, GeetCare was born from hearts that refused to ignore silent suffering anymore.

We don't just provide mental health services—we walk alongside you as a friend who remembers what it's like to feel lost. Every intervention, every conversation, every moment of support is crafted by people who've stood where you stand now.

You're Not Alone —

We're Holding Your Hand Through This Journey.

Geet Care is developing a Three-Layer Solution with Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Emotional Intelligence (EI). Powered by an internal team of Trained Professionals and Onboarding Experts like Psychiatrists, Psychologists, Pediatricians, Neurologists, and Neurosurgeons.

Your observations matter, and together, we'll provide your child with support that's backed by Science and real medical experts.

Wellness Services

Every journey is unique. Choose what resonates with your heart today. ↓

Stories of Transformation

Real experiences from individuals who found their path to wellness through our compassionate care and support

Anxiety Support
"I was really struggling with panic attacks during work meetings. My hands would shake, and I'd feel like I couldn't breathe. The GeetCare counselor helped me understand what was happening and taught me breathing exercises that actually work. Now I can present to clients without that overwhelming fear."

Priya Sharma

Software Developer

Bangalore, Karnataka

Student Support
"My CA finals were approaching and I was barely sleeping. The pressure from family and my own expectations was crushing me. When I called GeetCare at 1 AM crying, they didn't judge me at all. They listened and helped me create a study plan that didn't make me want to give up on everything."

Arjun Patel

CA Student

Ahmedabad, Gujarat

Life Coaching
"After my divorce, I felt like I had lost myself completely. Managing work, my kids, and the constant questions from relatives was exhausting. Through GeetCare, I learned that it's okay to put myself first sometimes. Small steps, but I'm finally sleeping better and my kids say I smile more now."

Sneha Reddy

School Teacher

Hyderabad, Telangana

Your story of healing could be next. Take the first step today. ↓

About us

Geet Care is India's first culturally rooted emotion-tech company, blending AI and emotional intelligence (EI) to deliver affordable, context-aware mental health & wellness solutions. Our platform offers tools for individual users, children, women, schools, and workplaces — designed with a deep understanding of Indian emotional and relational realities.
